Wood_Wood.title: Forest Alliance
Wood_Wood.desc: Wood meets Wood. It represents friends, siblings, or competitors. You will find strength in numbers today, but ensure you don't get lost in the crowd.

Wood_Fire.title: Blossoming Creativity
Wood_Fire.desc: Wood feeds Fire. Your energy flows out naturally to create something bright. It is an excellent day for expression, performance, and sharing ideas.

Wood_Earth.title: Rooting Success
Wood_Earth.desc: Wood controls Earth. You have the power to conquer obstacles and claim your territory. Financial opportunities are high as you can manage resources well.

Wood_Metal.title: Pruning & Shaping
Wood_Metal.desc: Metal chops Wood. You might feel criticized or restricted by rules. However, just as a tree needs pruning to grow tall, this pressure can refine you.

Wood_Water.title: Nourishing Rain
Wood_Water.desc: Water feeds Wood. You are fully supported by your environment. Mentors, documents, or knowledge will help you grow without much effort.

Fire_Wood.title: Fuel for Passion
Fire_Wood.desc: Wood feeds Fire. You have endless resources and energy supporting you. Whatever you start today will burn bright with the help of others.

Fire_Fire.title: Intense Blaze
Fire_Fire.desc: Fire meets Fire. The energy is explosive and passionate but can be competitive. Watch your temper, but use this drive to speed up your work.

Fire_Earth.title: Productive Ash
Fire_Earth.desc: Fire creates Earth. Your efforts produce tangible results. It is a day of 'output' where your hard work settles into something real and valuable.

Fire_Metal.title: Forging Gold
Fire_Metal.desc: Fire melts Metal. You have the upper hand to reshape challenging situations. It represents financial gain through effort and control.

Fire_Water.title: Steam & Fog
Fire_Water.desc: Water extinguishes Fire. You may feel dampened by authority or unexpected obstacles. Your passion might be blocked, causing frustration.

Earth_Wood.title: Under Pressure
Earth_Wood.desc: Wood breaks Earth. You might feel burdened by responsibilities or people demanding things from you. Stress levels could be high.

Earth_Fire.title: Warm Support
Earth_Fire.desc: Fire feeds Earth. You are being energized and supported. Documents, contracts, or recognition from superiors are likely today.

Earth_Earth.title: Solid Mountain
Earth_Earth.desc: Earth meets Earth. You stand firm and unshakeable. It represents trust and stability, but can also mean stagnation if you don't move.

Earth_Metal.title: Mining Treasures
Earth_Metal.desc: Earth generates Metal. Your hidden talents or investments are coming to the surface. It is a good day to show what you have produced.

Earth_Water.title: Controlling the Flow
Earth_Water.desc: Earth blocks Water. You are in a position to manage finances or control a chaotic situation. You have the upper hand in negotiations.

Metal_Wood.title: Harvest Time
Metal_Wood.desc: Metal chops Wood. This represents harvest and financial gain. You can cut through confusion and achieve your goals efficiently.

Metal_Fire.title: The Furnace
Metal_Fire.desc: Fire melts Metal. You are being tested. Pressure from bosses or the system is strong. It is uncomfortable but can transform you into something better.

Metal_Earth.title: Buried Treasure
Metal_Earth.desc: Earth feeds Metal. You are protected and validated. It is a day of receiving resources, validation, or rest without needing to fight.

Metal_Metal.title: Clashing Swords
Metal_Metal.desc: Metal meets Metal. The energy is sharp and competitive. You might meet a rival or a strong partner. Decisions will be made quickly.

Metal_Water.title: Polished Flow
Metal_Water.desc: Metal generates Water. Your logic and speech are flowing perfectly. It is a great day for persuasion, sales, or verbal expression.

Water_Wood.title: Creative Growth
Water_Wood.desc: Water feeds Wood. Your ideas are nourishing a new project. It is a gentle, creative day where your input helps things grow.

Water_Fire.title: Wealth & Control
Water_Fire.desc: Water controls Fire. You can manage the energy around you effectively. It is a prime day for financial planning or achieving goals.

Water_Earth.title: The Dam
Water_Earth.desc: Earth blocks Water. You might feel stuck or restricted by rules. Movement is slow. Use this time to reflect rather than force things.

Water_Metal.title: Clear Source
Water_Metal.desc: Metal generates Water. Your mind is crystal clear. You have strong backing and logic on your side. Ideal for studying or planning.

Water_Water.title: Deep Ocean
Water_Water.desc: Water meets Water. A day of deep emotions or social connection. You might feel overwhelmed or very connected to others.
